publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1552 Bill Kidd: Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers—That the Parliament abhors the publication in both The Scotsman and The Herald newspapers’ online blogs of blatantly anti-Semitic rhetoric by individuals who hide their identities behind screen names; believes that any such racist statements have no place in national newspapers, in print or online, and calls on the editors of these two major newspapers to ensure that such foul-mouthed attacks on any section of society are removed from their blogs before publication.
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Alex Neil*, Jamie Hepburn*, Murdo Fraser*, Alex Johnstone*, Jackson Carlaw*

S3M-1552 Bill Kidd: Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers—That the Parliament abhors the publication in both The Scotsman and The Herald newspapers’ online blogs of blatantly anti-Semitic rhetoric by individuals who hide their identities behind screen names; believes that any such racist statements have no place in national newspapers, in print or online, and calls on the editors of these two major newspapers to ensure that such foul-mouthed attacks on any section of society are removed from their blogs before publication. Supported by: Alex Neil, Jamie Hepburn, Murdo Fraser, Alex Johnstone, Jackson Carlaw, George Foulkes*, Ken Macintosh*, Marlyn Glen*, Karen Gillon*, Helen Eadie*, Elaine Murray*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Jack McConnell*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Bill Wilson*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Pauline McNeill*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Margaret Mitchell*, Ted Brocklebank*, Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Annabel Goldie*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Charlie Gordon*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Dave Thompson*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) John Lamont*
S3M-1552 Anti-Semitic Blogging in National Newspapers (lodged on 12 March 2008) Tom McCabe*
